rule: The output must return only the part of speech tag without any additional text or formatting.
input: sentence: Marie has two apples., word: two
validity:
The input consists of a sentence "Marie has two apples." and a word "two." According to the input specification, the sentence must be in natural language text, which "Marie has two apples." satisfies as it is a coherent sentence. The specification also requires that the word provided must be a single word from the sentence. The word "two" is indeed a single word present in the sentence. 

Therefore, the input complies with all the requirements of the input specification.

OK
